channel.title: 667 demonic wings (ice) or Supreme corruption (ice)--- just a SIMPLE recolour ;)
channel.description:
This would be easiest using frosties cache editor.
duplicate regular demonic wings.
replace all player models from
Male equip 1 all the way to Female equip 2
change all of them to = 68615
then go to model colours and put in
967=34770; --- (base colour)
779=302770; --- (glowing bit)
------------------------------------------------- If you would like to know anything else, just ask :P
